content: this is my no drama baby llama lovey pattern a super cute and cuddly soft crochet llama with a face that could melt anyone s heart it s so adorable and easy for a child to hold and carry this baby crocheted comforter will help the child feel secure and beloved and makes for some super cute baby photos it s made with a super soft chenille yarn and cotton yarn materials yarn 1 skein of sirdar smudge some aran weight cotton yarn for face and ears hooks 3 0mm 3 5mm 6 0mm scissors stitch markers optional needle scrap yarn or embroidery thread for making the face *video tutorial for making the face*
